name: Cats Cradle
description:
Play as a mouse avoiding the cat bourgeoise, through traps and lasers. 

W A S D for movement, ESC to pause the game. 

Cats cradle was a game made by a group of uni students for a game jam in less than 2 weeks. 

Evie - Project Manager, Concept, programmer

Leo - Asset production

Bradley - Asset production

Jake - programmer

Jan - programmer 

Laina - Concept

Alex -  sound design
